mapper.select: SELECT c.title, c.cover, c.lesson_num AS lessonNum, CONVERT(c.price, decimal(10,2)) AS price, s1.title AS parentSubject, s2.title AS childrenSubject, t.name AS teacherName FROM edu_course AS c LEFT JOIN edu_teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s1 ON c.subject_parent_id = s1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s2 ON c.subject_id = s2.id WHERE c.id = #{courseId};
